name: Platformer (ist_42)
description:
Input: WASD to move,  Space to jump/wall jump, Left click to attack

Goal: Reach the end of level and kill boss slimes to win

Update Log:

Apr/19/2022: Add cube texture. Add screen shake and frame pause when hit slime. Add tutorial level

Apr/16/2022: Switch to 3d level. Add sound effects and BGM. Add a boss and win scene.

Mar/25/2022: Add the main menu. Polish the new level, reflector the player's movement code. Add jump attack

Mar/2/2022: Add slime AI. Add a new level. Refactor player movement code.

Developers:

Haoran Qin -  Graphics, GamePlay, Level design

Xingjian Ding - UI, Enemy Pathfinding

Jiawei Shen - Sound Effect, Tutorial Level
